title: Crime Alert 12.25.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.25.18
description:
Orlando police desperate for answers after 15-year-old student  is gunned down walking to class.   In the trial of drug kingpin El Chapo,  details revealed on a cocaine shipment delivered with livestock.  An Ohio inmate escapes custody only to be found relaxing in a hot tub.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
